Please keep in mind State and City ordinances when thinking about  
large gatherings.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our Auditorium is located inside the grounds of the Fair Park in Childress, Texas.
==================================================================================

### Fair Park Auditorium

![Fair Park Entrance.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_91027f4ca712408586ed42722f87bd4d~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_600,h_271,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Fair%20Park%20Entrance.jpg)

We have three rooms available for rent:
=======================================

The Foyer, the Reunion Room and the Banquet room.
=================================================

Used for family reunions, business events, and other type of gatherings.
========================================================================

​
=

Foyer:
======

![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_bca54590d0374092b8358e9a6e1ff70b~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_485,h_282,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/0cfb0c_bca54590d0374092b8358e9a6e1ff70b~mv2.jpg)

Entrance to the "Foyer"
=======================

It's on the Southern side of the building, as you drive in to the park.
=======================================================================

![Foyer2.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_9112b123f100457cbe3e315d647b4559~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_361,h_270,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Foyer2.jpg)

![Foyer1.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_7d18759d45024e76b3741cb782c442a2~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_362,h_270,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Foyer1.jpg)

1728 SQ FT (48' X 36')
======================

Max Capacity 115
================

Reunion Room:
=============

![Reunion Room Entrance 1.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_64eca7789c50484e98c8f19113431e0a~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_488,h_181,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Reunion%20Room%20Entrance%201.jpg)

Entrance to the "Reunion Room"
==============================

It's on the Western side of the building, facing the baseball diamond and football stadium.
===========================================================================================

![Reunion Room Kitchen.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_c51641aa7d774640917eb39270e79f2f~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_173,h_224,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Reunion%20Room%20Kitchen.jpg)

![Reunion Room 1.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_50e69ca6db894870850ef1a4af149097~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_299,h_224,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Reunion%20Room%201.jpg)

![Reunion Room 2.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_ebe33ed0ff1e4b8596c2a9122926ee49~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_300,h_224,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Reunion%20Room%202.jpg)

1800 SQ FT (60' X 30')
======================

Max Capacity 120
================

Banquet Room:
=============

![Banquet Room Entrance.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_996e0c3929034a4cad9dc897d8f06d1d~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_499,h_181,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Banquet%20Room%20Entrance.jpg)

Entrance to the "Banquet Room"
==============================

It's on the Northern side of the building, facing the lake.  It also has the entrance to the main kitchen area (white doors).
=============================================================================================================================

![Banquet.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_7581fa8968b0412d9d53463448714a29~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_293,h_220,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Banquet.jpg)

![Banquet2.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_acf79509ef36494da9400f1c2ac2c93c~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_296,h_220,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Banquet2.jpg)

![Kitchen.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0cfb0c_b78a19093bdb4916a058fd055413940a~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_296,h_220,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Kitchen.jpg)

5600 SQ FT (80' X 70')
======================

Max Capacity 350
================

For availability please call us at 940-585-7959 or email [auditoriumbooking@childresstexas.net](mailto:auditoriumbooking@childresstexas.net)
